title: I Decided To Fake A Marriage With My Junior (♀️) To Shut My Parents Up
alternative_title: 親がうるさいので後輩（♀）と偽装結婚してみた。 ; I Decided to Fake a Marriage with My Junior to Shut My Parents Up ; Oya ga Urusai node Kouhai to Gisou Kekkon shitemita.
status: 親がうるさいので後輩（♀）と偽装結婚してみた。 ; I Decided to Fake a Marriage with My Junior to Shut My Parents Up ; Oya ga Urusai node Kouhai to Gisou Kekkon shitemita.
description:
Description :
        Morimoto is getting bugged by her parents to marry (a guy). Her (female) kouhai suggests she fake her marriage so her parents would stop but they will scrutinize every guy she might choose no matter what. Since there's a new law that allows homosexuals to marry, her kouhai suggests herself; only this kouhai has confessed to her before. What will become of their married life?
